price: او د الله له لوري په نعمت او لورينه خوشالي كوي او دا چى الله د مومنانو اجر نه ضايع كوي.
arabic: ۞ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yastabshirūna biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin wa-anna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-mu'minīna
